#include<iostream>
//#include<math>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
 int sum(int);
int main(){
    int test;
    long long unsigned int ans;
    cin>>test;
    while(test!=0){
    int n,b;
    cin>>n;
    b=n;
    int a=sum(b);
    float prod=pow(float(2),float(a));
    ans=n*prod;
    cout<<ans<<endl;

test--;
}
    //system("pause");
    return 0;
}
int sum(int a){
    int rem;
    int sum=0;
    while(a>0){
    rem=a%10;
    sum=sum+rem;
    a=a/10;
}
return sum;
}
